sentence.Network_en: They made it perfectly clear that it was pointless to go on.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们非常明确地表示继续下去毫无意义。

sentence.Network_en: The programme was bitty and pointless.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个计划东拼西凑，毫无意义。

sentence.Network_en: Without an audience the performance is pointless.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有观众，表演就不成其为表演了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... offend v. 冒犯， 得罪 pointless a. 无意义的 recognizable a. 可辩认的， 可识别的.
I am afraid I find this discussion a bit pointless ., 我认为这项讨论恐怕有点无意义.
The host bored his guests with a long and pointless anecdote ., 主人讲述的冗长而毫无意义的轶闻使客人们都厌倦了.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(104) ... pointing 弄尖 pointless 钝的 points of the compass 罗盘的三十二个方位.

list.abs: 钱是万恶之... ... 于是 thus;hence;thereupon 冤枉钱 not worth the money spent;pointless expense 折钱 to lose money;a loss.

...point ①点，地点，位置②尖端，(接)触点pointless ignition 无触点点火，晶体管点火point of support 支点
FFA pages are pointless link directories ., 完全免费页是无意义的链接目录.
He asked them all kinds of pointless questions , stalling for time ., 他向他们提了各种毫无意义的问题来拖延时间.

entry.tran: 无益的；无意义的；无目的的
entry.def: If you say that something is pointless, you are criticizing it because it has no sense or purpose.

example.ex: Without an audience the performance is pointless.
example.tran: 没有观众，表演就不成其为表演了。

means.word_mean: 1. not having a point especially a sharp point;
2. serving no useful purpose; having no excuse for being;

auth_sentence.content: To all appearances, it was a pointless misdemeanor.
auth_sentence.res_content: To all appearances, it was a pointless misdemeanor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To all appearances, it was a pointless misdemeanor.

auth_sentence.content: If not, kindly refrain from sending pointless signals.
auth_sentence.res_content: If not, kindly refrain from sending pointless signals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If not, kindly refrain from sending pointless signals.

means.word_mean: 无意义的;不可能有结果的;无用的;无益的

sentences.en: He asked them all kinds of pointless questions, stalling for time.
sentences.cn: 他向他们提了各种毫无意义的问题来拖延时间。

sentences.en: In the end it proved a pointless exercise.
sentences.cn: 最终证明这是个无意义的工作。

sentences.en: It’s pointless trying to keep your friendship secret—it’s common knowledge already.
sentences.cn: 你们无须将友情保密——其实已尽人皆知。

sentences.en: She considered it pointless to plan in too much detail.
sentences.cn: 她认为计划得太详细没有意义。

sentences.en: We don’t know all the circumstances,so it would be pointless to speculate.
sentences.cn: 我们不了解所有的情况,妄加推测是没有意义的。
